summary:
This ENB preset took over from Meiko and Hana ENB.
Translating Aoharu is Youth.It is a color like another game.
Check with the image tabbed.
I used version 0.319 of the ENB series of TES Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#6fa8dc][size=3]Thank you very much viewing this mod!

[/size][size=3]　  For better visuals (MOD which I use)
[/size][font=Trebuchet MS, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=2][b]Face Light[/b][/size][/font]
[size=2][b]Relighting Skyrim Series[/b]
[/size][size=2][b]Grass Field 2[/b]
[/size][size=2][b]Moon Glow[/b][/size][size=2][b]Neige[/b]
[b]HD[/b][/size][size=2][b]No Snow Under The Roof[/b]
[/size][size=2][b]Real Skyrim Snowflakes - Vivid Snow[/b]
[/size][b][size=2]TreesHD_Skyrim_variation
[/size][size=2]Vivid Landscapes - All in One
[/size][size=2]Tamriel Reloaded HD
[/size][size=2]4K Parallax Treebark[/size][/b][size=2][b]Glacierslab[/b]
[/size][size=3] ...User's image is not using MOD to change the weather.

[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]    [b]Confirmation and sometimes editing: [/b]

[/size][size=3]   1.Disable "Antialiasing" and "Anisotropic filtering" in the SkyrimLauncher options. Not doing so will disable some [/size][size=3]ENB effects.

[/size][size=3]   2.Document/My Games/skyrim[/size][size=2] 
   [b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b]
[/size]    [Display][size=2]
[/size][size=2]   bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
 [/size][size=2]   bDrawLandShadows=1
[/size][size=2]   bTreesReceiveShadows=1
[/size][size=2]   bShadowsOnGrass=1
[/size][size=2]   iMultiSample=0
 [/size][size=2]   bFXAAEnabled=0

[/size][size=3]   [/size][size=3] 3.INSTALLATION [/size][size=2]     
"D3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" that match the ver of MOD are required from ENB.[/size][size=2]    
  From the WrapperVersion folder,[/size][size=2]    
 http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html[/size][size=2]　
After downloading ([/size][/color][color=#6d9eeb]Aoharu[/color][color=#6fa8dc][size=2] ENB), put all the files in the unzipped folder into Skyrim's main folder.

[/size][size=3]   4.If, during a play, CTD comes to be outstanding[/size][size=3] 
    [b]enblocal.ini [/b]
[/size][size=3]  [/size][size=2]   [MEMORY]
[/size][size=3] [/size][size=2]  ReservedMemorySizeMb=64 ... (256,512,1024)
[/size][size=2]   For video cards with 2GB or more VRAM, 512 is a good baseline. For less VRAM, 256 can work better.
[/size][size=2]   VideoMemorySizeMb=0 ... change to your VRAM size. (2048,4096,8192...)
[/size][size=2]   AutodetectVideoMemorySize=false
[/size][size=3]   These settings must be set according to the available VRAM.[/size][/color][/center][size=3][center]﻿[/center][/size]
author: takakoba
